channel.title: CVE Feed for Imaging Data Commons -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Imaging Data Commons -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24794|2024-02-20T18:00:09.561Z -- Imaging Data Commons -- libdicom
item.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the DICOM Element Parsing as implemented in Imaging Data Commons libdicom 1.0.5. A specially crafted DICOM file can cause premature freeing of memory that is used later. To trigger this vulnerability, an attacker would need to induce the vulnerable application to process a malicious DICOM image.The Use-After-Free happens in the `parse_meta_sequence_end()` parsing the Sequence Value Represenations.

item.title: CVE-2024-24793|2024-02-20T18:00:09.275Z -- Imaging Data Commons -- libdicom
item.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the DICOM Element Parsing as implemented in Imaging Data Commons libdicom 1.0.5. A specially crafted DICOM file can cause premature freeing of memory that is used later. To trigger this vulnerability, an attacker would need to induce the vulnerable application to process a malicious DICOM image.The Use-After-Free happens in the `parse_meta_element_create()` parsing the elements in the File Meta Information header.
